name: Stench
flavor_text: The stench helps keep wild Pokémon away.
effect: If this Pokemon is first on your belt, the chance of a wild encounter drops.

name: Drizzle
flavor_text: The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle.
effect: Rain Dance is in effect while this Pokemon is in battle.

name: Speed Boost
flavor_text: The Pokémon's Speed stat is gradually boosted.
effect: This Pokemon's Speed rises one level every turn.

name: Battle Armor
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
effect: No moves will critically hit this Pokemon.

name: Sturdy
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks.
effect: One-hit KO moves do not work on this Pokemon.

name: Damp
flavor_text: Prevents combatants from self destructing.
effect: Neither this Pokemon nor the enemy can use Explosion or Selfdestruct.

name: Limber
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Paralyzed.

name: Sand Veil
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.
effect: This Pokemon's Evasion rises one level during Sandstorm.

name: Static
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.
effect: Enemy Pokemon have a 30% chance of becoming Paralyzed every time they touch this Pokemon.

name: Volt Absorb
flavor_text: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
effect: Damage from Electric moves instead heals up to 1/4 of this Pokemon's max HP.

name: Water Absorb
flavor_text: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
effect: Damage from Water moves instead heals up to 1/4 of this Pokemon's max HP.

name: Oblivious
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Attracted.

name: Cloud Nine
flavor_text: Eliminates the effects of weather.
effect: Weather does not affect this Pokemon.

name: Compoundeyes
flavor_text: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.
effect: This Pokemon's moves receive a 30% increase in Accuracy.

name: Insomnia
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Asleep.

name: Color Change
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.
effect: This Pokemon's type changes to that of the last move that inflicted damage.

name: Immunity
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Poisoned.

name: Flash Fire
flavor_text: Powers up Fire-type moves if hit by a fire move.
effect: When this Pokemon takes damage from a Fire move, it becomes immune to Fire moves and all its Fire moves do 50% more damage until it leaves battle.

name: Shield Dust
flavor_text: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.
effect: This Pokemon is immune to stat/status changes from damaging moves.

name: Own Tempo
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Confused.

name: Suction Cups
flavor_text: Negates moves that force switching out.
effect: This Pokemon cannot be switched with Roar or Whirlwind.

name: Intimidate
flavor_text: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.
effect: This Pokemon lowers the enemy's Attack one level when it enters battle.

name: Shadow Tag
flavor_text: Prevents the foe from escaping.
effect: Enemy Pokemon cannot run or be switched out.

name: Rough Skin
flavor_text: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.
effect: Enemy Pokemon receive 1/8 their max HP in damage every time they touch this Pokemon.

name: Wonder Guard
flavor_text: Only supereffective moves will hit.
effect: This Pokemon can only be damaged by moves of types it is weak to.

name: Levitate
flavor_text: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
effect: This Pokemon does not take damage from Ground moves.

name: Effect Spore
flavor_text: Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep.
effect: Enemy Pokemon have a 30% chance of becoming Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Asleep every time they touch this Pokemon.

name: Synchronize
flavor_text: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
effect: When this Pokemon becomes Burned, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, the enemy does too.

name: Clear Body
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon's stats from being lowered.
effect: This Pokemon's stats cannot be lowered.

name: Natural Cure
flavor_text: All status problems are healed upon switching out.
effect: This Pokemon's status returns to normal when it leaves battle.

name: Lightningrod
flavor_text: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves.
effect: This Pokemon takes damage from Electric moves aimed at its partner.

name: Serene Grace
flavor_text: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.
effect: The chance of a move's stat/status effect occuring is double for this Pokemon.

name: Swift Swim
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.
effect: This Pokemon's Speed doubles during Rain Dance.

name: Chlorophyll
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.
effect: This Pokemon's Speed doubles during Sunny Day.

name: Illuminate
flavor_text: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
effect: If this Pokemon is first on your belt, the chance of a wild encounter rises.

name: Trace
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the foe's ability.
effect: This Pokemon copies the ability of the enemy when entering battle.

name: Huge Power
flavor_text: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.
effect: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

name: Poison Point
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe.
effect: Enemy Pokemon have a 30% chance of becoming Poisoned every time they touch this Pokemon.

name: Inner Focus
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.
effect: This Pokemon will not Flinch.

name: Magma Armor
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Frozen.

name: Water Veil
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Burned.

name: Magnet Pull
flavor_text: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.
effect: Steel enemies cannot run or be switched out.

name: Soundproof
flavor_text: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.
effect: This Pokemon is immune to Growl, Grasswhistle, Hyper Voice, Heal Bell, Metal Sound, Perish Song, Roar, Screech, Sing, Snore, Supersonic, and Uproar.

name: Rain Dish
flavor_text: The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain.
effect: This Pokemon regains 1/16 its max HP every turn during Rain Dance.

name: Sand Stream
flavor_text: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.
effect: Sandstorm is in effect while this Pokemon is in battle.

name: Pressure
flavor_text: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.
effect: Opposing Pokemon must use 2 PP per move.

name: Thick Fat
flavor_text: Raises resistance to Fire-and Ice-type moves.
effect: Fire and Ice moves only do half damage against this Pokemon.

name: Early Bird
flavor_text: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
effect: This Pokemon wakes up from Sleep in half as many turns, including Sleep from Rest.

name: Flame Body
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the foe.
effect: Enemy Pokemon have a 30% chance of becoming Burned every time they touch this Pokemon.

name: Run Away
flavor_text: Enables sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
effect: This Pokemon can always run from wild battles.

name: Keen Eye
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.
effect: This Pokemon cannot have its Accuracy lowered.

name: Hyper Cutter
flavor_text: Prevents the Attack stat from being lowered.
effect: This Pokemon cannot have its Attack lowered.

name: Pickup
flavor_text: The Pokémon may pick up items.
effect: After battle, this Pokemon will sometimes be holding an item if it was not already.

name: Truant
flavor_text: The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.
effect: Whenever this Pokemon deals damage, it skips its next turn.

name: Hustle
flavor_text: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
effect: This Pokemon's base Attack is increased by 50%, but its physical moves have 80% of their usual accuracy.

name: Cute Charm
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
effect: Enemy Pokemon have a 30% chance of becoming Attracted every time they touch this Pokemon.

name: Plus
flavor_text: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus.
effect: When this Pokemon's partner has Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

name: Minus
flavor_text: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus.
effect: When this Pokemon's partner has Plus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

name: Forecast
flavor_text: CASTFORM transforms with the weather.
effect: This Pokemon's type changes to match the weather.

name: Sticky Hold
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.
effect: This Pokemon's item cannot be removed by enemy moves.

name: Shed Skin
flavor_text: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.
effect: Each turn, this Pokemon has a 1/3 chance of its status becoming normal.

name: Guts
flavor_text: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
effect: When this Pokemon has a major status ailment, its Attack increases by 50%.

name: Marvel Scale
flavor_text: Boosts Defense if there is a status problem.
effect: When this Pokemon has a status condition, its Defense increases by 50%.

name: Liquid Ooze
flavor_text: Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move.
effect: When the enemy uses absorbtion moves on this Pokemon, it loses HP instead of gaining.

name: Overgrow
flavor_text: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
effect: When this Pokemon's HP is 1/3 its max or lower, its Grass moves do 50% more damage.

name: Blaze
flavor_text: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.
effect: When this Pokemon's HP is 1/3 its max or lower, its Fire moves do 50% more damage.

name: Torrent
flavor_text: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.
effect: When this Pokemon's HP is 1/3 its max or lower, its Water moves do 50% more damage.

name: Swarm
flavor_text: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
effect: When this Pokemon's HP is 1/3 its max or lower, its Bug moves do 50% more damage.

name: Rock Head
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
effect: This Pokemon does not receive any recoil from moves.

name: Drought
flavor_text: The Pokémon makes it sunny if it is in battle.
effect: Sunny Day is in effect while this Pokemon is in battle.

name: Arena Trap
flavor_text: Prevents the foe from fleeing.
effect: Prevents enemy Pokemon (except Flying Pokemon and Pokemon that can Levitate) from running or being switched out.

name: Vital Spirit
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
effect: This Pokemon cannot become Asleep.

name: White Smoke
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon's stats from being lowered.
effect: This Pokemon's stats cannot be lowered.

name: Pure Power
flavor_text: Boosts the power of physical attacks.
effect: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

name: Shell Armor
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
effect: No moves will critically hit this Pokemon.

name: Air Lock
flavor_text: Eliminates the effects of weather.
effect: Weather does not affect this Pokemon.

name: Tangled Feet
flavor_text: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
effect: This Pokemon's Evasion rises when it's Confused.

name: Motor Drive
flavor_text: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.
effect: This Pokemon's Speed rises one level when it is struck by an Electric move.

name: Rivalry
flavor_text: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.
effect: This Pokemon's Attack rises when fighting an enemy of the same gender.

name: Steadfast
flavor_text: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.
effect: This Pokemon's Speed rises one level when it Flinches.

name: Snow Cloak
flavor_text: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.
effect: This Pokemon's Evasion rises one level during Hail.

name: Gluttony
flavor_text: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
effect: This Pokemon will eat held berries triggered by low HP at 1/2 its max HP rather than 1/4.

name: Anger Point
flavor_text: Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit.
effect: This Pokemon's Attack rises to its maximum when it is hit with a critical hit.

name: Unburden
flavor_text: Raises Speed if a held item is used.
effect: This Pokemon's Speed rises one level when it uses or loses its held item.

name: Heat Proof
flavor_text: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
effect: This Pokemon takes half damage from Fire moves.

name: Simple
flavor_text: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.
effect: Stat changes are doubled against this Pokemon, although the maximum of six is unchanged.

name: Dry Skin
flavor_text: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.
effect: This Pokemon gradually loses HP per turn during Sunny Day, and gradually heals during Rain Dance.  This Pokemon takes double damage from Fire attacks, but Water attacks heal it for 1/4 its HP.

name: Download
flavor_text: Adjusts power according to the foe's ability.
effect: When this Pokemon enters battle, it raises one level in the Attack stat corresponding to its opponent's weaker Defense stat.

name: Iron Fist
flavor_text: Boosts the power of punching moves.
effect: This Pokemon's Punch moves do 20% more damage.

name: Poison Heal
flavor_text: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
effect: This Pokemon regains 1/8 its max HP each turn when it is Poisoned.

name: Adaptability
flavor_text: Powers up moves of the same type.
effect: Moves with the same type as this Pokemon become more powerful.

name: Skill Link
flavor_text: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.
effect: This Pokemon always hits five times with 2-to-5-hit moves.

name: Hydration
flavor_text: Heals status problems if it is raining.
effect: This Pokemon is cured of any major status effects during Rain Dance.

name: Solar Power
flavor_text: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.
effect: This Pokemon's max HP lowers and Special Attack rises one level during Sunny Day.

name: Quick Feet
flavor_text: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
effect: This Pokemon's Speed rises one level when it has a major status effect.

name: Normalize
flavor_text: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.
effect: All of this Pokemon's moves are Normal.

name: Sniper
flavor_text: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.
effect: This Pokemon inflicts double damage with critical hits.

name: Magic Guard
flavor_text: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
effect: This Pokemon is immune to damage not caused directly by an attack.

name: No Guard
flavor_text: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe's attacks land.
effect: All damage-inflicting moves have 100% Accuracy while this Pokemon is in battle.

name: Stall
flavor_text: The Pokémon moves after even slower foes.
effect: This Pokemon always goes second.

name: Technician
flavor_text: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
effect: This Pokemon inflicts 50% more damage with moves that have power of 60 or less.  Hidden Power is not affected.

name: Leaf Guard
flavor_text: Prevents status problems in sunny weather.
effect: This Pokemon is immune to major status effects during Sunny Day.

name: Klutz
flavor_text: The Pokémon can't use any held items.
effect: This Pokemon cannot use its held item.

name: Mold Breaker
flavor_text: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.
effect: Enemy Pokemon cannot prevent attacks with abilities.

name: Super Luck
flavor_text: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.
effect: This Pokemon has a higher chance to hit critically..

name: Aftermath
flavor_text: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
effect: When this Pokemon is fainted by a contact move, the attacker takes 1/4 its max HP in damage.

name: Anticipation
flavor_text: Senses the foe's dangerous moves.
effect: This Pokemon will be aware when an opposing Pokemon with a move that would do super-effective damage against it switches in.

name: Forewarn
flavor_text: Determines what moves the foe has.
effect: This Pokemon can see its opponent's move with the highest power, or one of them at random in the case of a tie.

name: Unaware
flavor_text: Ignores any change in ability by the foe.
effect: This Pokemon ignores any of the enemy's stat changes.  Speed calculations are unaffected.

name: Tinted Lens
flavor_text: Powers up "not very effective" moves.
effect: This Pokemon inflicts double damage with not-very-effective moves.

name: Filter
flavor_text: Powers down super-effective moves.
effect: This Pokemon takes half damage from super-effective moves.

name: Slow Start
flavor_text: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.
effect: This Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for the first few turns it's in battle.

name: Scrappy
flavor_text: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.
effect: This Pokemon can hit Ghost Pokemon with Normal and Fighting moves.

name: Storm Drain
flavor_text: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.
effect: All Water moves are drawn to this Pokemon.

name: Ice Body
flavor_text: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.
effect: This Pokemon regains HP during Hail.

name: Solid Rock
flavor_text: Powers down super-effective moves.
effect: This Pokemon takes less damage from super-effective moves.

name: Snow Warning
flavor_text: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.
effect: Hail is in effect while this Pokemon is in battle.

name: Honey Gather
flavor_text: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.
effect: This Pokemon picks up a Sweet Honey after battle.

name: Frisk
flavor_text: The Pokémon can check the foe's held item.
effect: This Pokemon can see what enemy Pokemon are holding.

name: Reckless
flavor_text: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
effect: Opposing Pokemon take 30% more damage from recoil.

name: Multitype
flavor_text: Changes type to match the held Plate.
effect: This Pokemon changes type and form to match the Plate it holds.

name: Flower Gift
flavor_text: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.
effect: During Sunny Day, this Pokemon changes form, and both it and its ally's Attack and Special Attack increase by 50%.

name: Bad Dreams
flavor_text: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP.
effect: Enemy Pokemon lose HP every turn they are Sleeping.

name: No Ability
effect: This Pokemon has no special ability.
